Articles.Content:
Basicly just this: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=147042658

You can also pass it several times on accent, and be unlucky to have it hit you, it may seem.

Otherwise, loving it.

*edit*

They have collision detection, and appear to move with the ship

*edit*

nevermind, the floated away after some time warp.

Edited May 22, 2013 by TAz00

I seem to have the exact same problem too. I've only had the stability launch assistance towers spawn and they spawn in the same configuration as the pre-launch towers. I generally have a problem with them spawning around the 1:05 minute mark into the mission (it continually destroyed my new rover with command seat) as the rocket began to make its gravity turn. I don't know if this is related to the rocket turning or if it was just coincidence. I tried to launch the same rocket without an launch stability towers (by resting it on the ground) and interestingly the same towers appeared. I've also seen the towers appear in orbit and (sadly as they've created some crazy debris) during transfer orbits to mun.
